title: Expert Performance Improvement Strategy Through Baseball Batter Cognitive-Perceptual Training

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental knowledge of sports science theories and general understanding of human cognitive processes
context.additional_context: Learning cognitive-perceptual mechanisms applicable to decision-making training in medical/technical fields by analyzing baseball batting training cases as analytical tools

learning_goals: Achieve 85% accuracy in identifying pitch types within 0.3 seconds through partial task training
Reduce situational judgment error rates by 40% using transfer-appropriate tasks
Shorten response time by 15% in simulated training with video occlusion techniques
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
